title: Where to find runepages in new preseason 7 client?
body: i saved up for a runepage. couldnt find additional runepage purchase in client. **pls reply** w/ **answer** {{item:3151}}  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Go to Store, under gameplay 

There should be 3 tabs on your left side showing, click on tier and click on show all; there you will find additional rune page
This also applies to the legacy client aswell
sir i want to PURCHASE a new runepage
